questions.text: In 1922 the WPA reviewed a law that addressed the citizenship status of those who married 'aliens'. This law stated

answers.text: any women who married a non-citizen prior to 1922 would lose her citizenship.
any man who married a non-citizen women prior to 1922 would lose his citizenship.
any women who married a non-citizen relative prior to 1922 would lose her citizenship.
any man who married a citizen prior to 1922 would lose his citizenship.

questions.text: John Collier was instrumental in ending the loss of reservations lands held by Indians, and in enabling many tribal nations to reinstitute self-government and preserve their traditional culture. He was later criticised for his efforts to

answers.text: increase the number of animals on the reservations and tribal lands.
decrease the water rights for Navajo.
decrease tribal autonomy all Native Americans.
